pci_projects_project_training_onboarding: Training machine learning algorithms from Docker containers has never been so simple.
Provide the data to use and the Docker image to boot. Then enter the quantity of resources you want (RAM, CPU, GPU).
We automatically schedule the job on the right hardware, and take care of everything.
By continuing, you authorise the OVHcloud AI Training service to access the content stored in your object containers within your project. This access will only be used to sync your data.
Learn how to quickly install the AI Training client on your work desktop.
Price and billing details for the AI Training solution.
Find out how to schedule jobs linked to your own data to run on GPU instances.
